pv_260.lyric_en.001=The promise that the two of us will always dance together
pv_260.lyric_en.002=is turned into a lie by my growing bosom.
pv_260.lyric_en.003=With our blond hair reflected in the mirror,
pv_260.lyric_en.004=we take turns combing for each other.
pv_260.lyric_en.005=We used to be rocked in the same bed.
pv_260.lyric_en.006=The two of us were connected with our hands held together.
pv_260.lyric_en.007=Now an unrecognized face is reflected, and the whispering voice deeper.
pv_260.lyric_en.008=I will shatter that mirror with this hammer in my hand.
pv_260.lyric_en.009=Tearing down our built toy castle into pieces, our creaking bones
pv_260.lyric_en.010=are the bell that announces the end to the knight and the princess.
pv_260.lyric_en.011=In the distorted mirror, with hands folded, our fingers are not of the
pv_260.lyric_en.012=same length. From now on we will sleep in separate beds?
pv_260.lyric_en.013=You whisper to me "good night."
pv_260.lyric_en.014=As you turn the doorknob and open the door,
pv_260.lyric_en.015=I jump to that sound and grab the edge of your clothes.
pv_260.lyric_en.016=I kiss your extended fingers,
pv_260.lyric_en.017=in that instant an impulse runs through my spine.
pv_260.lyric_en.018=Don't turn off the light if I'm sleeping alone at night.
pv_260.lyric_en.019=As I scream "no," I will pound my pillow with my right hand.
pv_260.lyric_en.020=Saying things like "I'm scared of ghosts," you're such a baby,
pv_260.lyric_en.021=my princess. Your watery eyes, however, are hinting to me something
pv_260.lyric_en.022=different. Our private time unknown to daddy and mommy,
pv_260.lyric_en.023=is it finally over? It's a faraway dream.
pv_260.lyric_en.024=Your body temperature, through the thin blanket,
pv_260.lyric_en.025=breaks open my lock.
pv_260.lyric_en.026=As we silently lock the door,
pv_260.lyric_en.027=our gazing pupils are looking for an answer.
pv_260.lyric_en.028=I erase my childish excuse together with the light.
pv_260.lyric_en.029=If I can no longer pick up your hair, then I will also tell lies.
pv_260.lyric_en.030=Stopping time, we now embrace tightly,
pv_260.lyric_en.031=as we try to synchronize our ticking heartbeats.
pv_260.lyric_en.032=With your melting hot breath and hugging warmth,
pv_260.lyric_en.033=I won't make any further move.
pv_260.lyric_en.034=It's as if I'm your knight.

pv_262.lyric_en.001=For someone like me, who needs a guiding beat, concertos seem the best
pv_262.lyric_en.002=Just follow the baton that the conductor is waving, and harmony is
pv_262.lyric_en.003=Always guaranteed. On downbeats,
pv_262.lyric_en.004=Stoic and respected; only settle for the best.
pv_262.lyric_en.005=But on upbeats
pv_262.lyric_en.006=I have ad-lib sometimes or else I'd get too bored with my life
pv_262.lyric_en.007=Ahh~ Just blindly following the same score each of every day would
pv_262.lyric_en.008=Make my life seem far too mundane. I think I'd rather drown inside a
pv_262.lyric_en.009=Whirlpool of indulgent immorality. I can feel your love shining on your
pv_262.lyric_en.010=Finger. Tender to the touch that it's almost invisible.
pv_262.lyric_en.011=And the words you whisper in my ear, speak of forbidden serenades.
pv_262.lyric_en.012=For 27 hours, each time I opened up my eyes
pv_262.lyric_en.013=My mind could only think of you for the whole time.
pv_262.lyric_en.014=All of my friends say that you're no good for me, but I can't say I'll
pv_262.lyric_en.015=Ever agree. Ahh~ This thirst I have is not satisfied by such ordinary
pv_262.lyric_en.016=Words. I need some dialogue that can be naughty; that can cause a scene.
pv_262.lyric_en.017=The scores of love we shared, scattered up above us.
pv_262.lyric_en.018=Were damaged from the start,
pv_262.lyric_en.019=And then broke apart. But we try retaining what we had; with a kiss,
pv_262.lyric_en.020=The rhapsody continues. The rhythmic beat of love starts
pv_262.lyric_en.021=Accelerating, making it clear what we should do.
pv_262.lyric_en.022=Let's make it fortissimo tonight. And embrace each other as tightly as
pv_262.lyric_en.023=We can. As we both lay here, our bodies intertwined, both our voices
pv_262.lyric_en.024=Slowly fade away into the night. So who cares about what's right or
pv_262.lyric_en.025=Wrong? I wish I could stay in this moment forever.

pv_603.lyric.001=To what color am I dyed?
pv_603.lyric.002=The size of the dyed thing changes
pv_603.lyric.003=because of the difference of the dyed color.
pv_603.lyric.004=I can grow up if it dyes to good people color.
pv_603.lyric.005=I want to dye me to such a color.
pv_603.lyric.006=To what color am I dyed?
pv_603.lyric.007=The color to be dyed
pv_603.lyric.008=changes under the influence of the private life.
pv_603.lyric.009=I degenerate if it dyes to villain color.
pv_603.lyric.010=The color for which I hope is a color with high brightness.
pv_603.lyric.011=I want to become beautiful mind.
pv_603.lyric.012=I want to become it.
pv_603.lyric.013=I obtain the conscience.
pv_603.lyric.014=And, becomes a luminous color.
pv_603.lyric.015=There are a lot of black and white in the private life.
pv_603.lyric.016=My color shines by "Affection" and "Esteem" and
pv_603.lyric.017="Kindness" and "Looking after" and "Nursing" and
pv_603.lyric.018="Protection" and "Consideration" and "Respect" and
pv_603.lyric.019="Solicitude" and "Encouragement" and "Friendship", etc.
pv_603.lyric.020=I want to choose color
pv_603.lyric.021=that is brighter than the dark color.
pv_603.lyric.022=If the surrounding is a dark color, I look large.
pv_603.lyric.023=If the surrounding is a luminous color,
pv_603.lyric.024=my existence might be thin.
pv_603.lyric.025=The luminous color improves the environment.
pv_603.lyric.026=The luminous color shines on the dark.
pv_603.lyric.027=However, the luminous color shines only in a dark place.
pv_603.lyric.028=Still, I do not care.
pv_603.lyric.029=A dark color absorbs the luminous color.
pv_603.lyric.030=My existence disappears if it winks out.
pv_603.lyric.031=I can become energetic by shining on surroundings.
pv_603.lyric.032=When I become tired and do not shine.
pv_603.lyric.033=The source of "Vigour"
pv_603.lyric.034=can be gotten from "Good man color".
pv_603.lyric.035=The color for which other people hope to me.
pv_603.lyric.036=It is different from the color for which I hope.
pv_603.lyric.037=However, if it is an earth friendly color,
pv_603.lyric.038=I like the "Color that other people like".
pv_603.lyric.039=A dark color in the interior of the spirit
pv_603.lyric.040=is also as the case may be necessary.
pv_603.lyric.041=Both necessary dark colors and bright colors.
pv_603.lyric.042=I want to dye me moderately.
pv_603.lyric.043=It is possible to change greatly
pv_603.lyric.044=in "Thing that becomes a luminous color from a dark color"
pv_603.lyric.045=even if my existence is small.
pv_603.lyric.046=Now will grow in the future even if it is small.
